segments.text: Looking at the boy on the stool, I feel a sense of dread.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's stretching to reach the cookie jar, and that stool looks so unstable.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can see the stool's legs are splayed, ready to tip over any second.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is waiting for a cookie, completely unaware of the danger.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I want to shout and warn them, but I know they can't hear me.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy's plate is ready to catch cookies, but he might fall instead.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is still drying dishes, clueless about what's happening behind her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I notice the water puddle getting closer to the stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This could end badly if someone doesn't intervene soon.
segments.speaker: PAR
